4307970.name: Flips: A 2D Flipbook Animation Tool by zelun_
4307970.description:
Flips is a lightweight 2D flipbook animation tool focused on speed, simplicity, and creative freedom.

Inspired by classic flipbook animation and tools like Flipnote, Flips lets you draw frame by frame with an intuitive workflow that stays out of your way. No timelines full of clutter, no unnecessary complexity. Just draw, flip, animate.

Designed for artists, animators, game developers, and anyone who enjoys sketching motion.

Features

• Frame by frame flipbook animation
• Simple drawing tools focused on sketching and animation
• Onion skin support for smooth motion
• Layer system with static and animated layers
• Easy frame management
• Export animations as GIF or PNG
• Keyboard friendly workflow
• Lightweight and fast

Flips is ideal for rough animation, storyboarding, pixel style motion, game concepts, and expressive sketches.

Draw. Flip. Animate.
